column1: #text=I love reading , and the library provides an endless array of books to choose from .
#text=When I go to the library , I browse the various sections to select the books I ' m going to check out .
#text=Sometimes I ' m in the mood for mystery , other times I prefer humor .
#text=After flipping through some books in the different sections , I make my choices .
#text=I usually choose a few books to check out .
#text=With my selections and library card in hand , I make my way to the front desk and wait in line .
#text=When it is my turn , I present my library card to the librarian .
#text=She scans the books to check them out under my name .
#text=After the books are checked out to me , I ' m headed home .
#text=I have 2 weeks to enjoy the books before returning them back to the library .
#text=When the 2 weeks are up , I return the books in the library ' s drop box , and look forward to checking out a new batch .
